document_data.name: Alasz Ironwood
document_data.mainbody: '''Alasz Ironwood''' was a sarcastic horse breeder and trader in [[High Dale]].
document_data.History: Alasz was once a high-ranking [[Zhentilar]] warrior before he settled in High Dale. When in [[1358 DR]] a secret [[Zhent]] occupation army occupied the dale, Alasz was a member of the [[Council of the High Dale]].
